bruh moment
I cant believe what i just read. This is fked up

Before he started dating Asuna, the person he had legitimately rejected at that time was Silica. After that, the only other person he rejected was his cousin/adoptive sister, Suguha. 

Sachi had died before he could confess his potential(?) feelings, and Lisbeth doesn't count because he and Asuna were already dating at that point. 

And again, everyone after that was already vetoed the right to romantically pursue him once he started dating Asuna.(besides Suguha, as she still attempted)

But it really sucks to see people use one of the best relationships in anime, and then turn it into an NTR doujin in order satisfy their honestly sad cuckold fantasies.

@τ0m But he's only in love with Asuna, and everyone else in his so-called "Harem" have actually all been rejected by him. Maybe not verbally, but they were essentially vetoed the right to pursue him when he started dating Asuna, which was almost from the very beginning.
